Love the Stab and Twist.Elite 2: Fluorite gains DMG Dealt +20% against Slowed targets.

Unpredictable.Elite 3: Grants 20% chance of Arts DMG immunity and grants Fluorite ATK +20% for 10s. This effect cannot stack.

Wildlands Trekker.Elite 3: Assign to Growth Chamber to grant rare mineral growth rate +20%

Reader of Emotions.Elite 4: Assign to Control Nexus to grant all operators' Mood Regen +16%
